Detailed Description

Structure holding the state of the file.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

File::FileState::FileState (   )  [inline]
 

Field Documentation

FileChunkOperator* File::FileState::m_chunk_operator
 

The chunk operator currently used. If no chunk operation is in progress currently then this pointer is 0.

UINT8 File::FileState::m_chunk_size
 

The chunk size to use for operation in chunk mode. This value is specified in terms of 4 KB blocks (i.e. 4096 bytes). Hence, to get the effective chunk size in KB, multiply this value with 4.

UINT32 File::FileState::m_cur_file_pos
 

The current file position at which the next ReadCur() or WriteCur() operation takes place.

Error File::FileState::m_last_error [mutable]
 

Error code of last operation.

OpenMode File::FileState::m_open_mode
 

The mode the file is opened with.

BOOLEAN File::FileState::m_send_progress_messages
 

This flag indicates whether chunk mode operations shall send progress messages.

BOOLEAN File::FileState::m_temporary
 

The temporary flag.
